skills.skill: Containerization and Deployment (Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Pulumi)
Web Services and APIs (REST, GraphQL, GRPC, OpenAPI)
Web Application Development (Javascript, Typescript, React, CSS)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, deploy, and maintain cloud-native applications on services like GCP or AWS.
Build and operate cloud applications and infrastructure for orchestrating the selection, running, and management of tests on Apple products.
Collect, store, analyze, visualize, and report the results of tests, impacting the entire organization.
Transition locally run applications and processes to cloud providers, and invent and build new infrastructure features.
Work collaboratively and independently in a rapidly changing environment with ever-changing priorities.
Play a vital role in the cloud infrastructure used to build the visual experience on billions of devices.

education_certification.credential: BS/MS degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent experience
